entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
